data.title: Opi, Enugu State, Nigeria
data.text:
Opi is a town in Enugu State, Nigeria, located at latitude 6.7814000 and longitude 7.4365000. The town has a tropical climate with an average temperature of 27 degrees Celsius. Opi has a rich history and heritage, being one of the oldest towns in Enugu State. The town is known for its traditional festivals, such as the New Yam Festival and the Oji Festival.
